title: Looking for a top laner (bronze/silver solo queue) for my ranked 5s team
body:
looking for a preferably top lane main, in bronze or silver, for my ranked 5s team. add me if interested, or leave a comment, cheers.

P.S. we are looking at starting 5s in the preseason.

replies.body: Umm would you take a diamond player? That mains top/adc ?

alright guys, thanks for helping and showing your interest in our team, but we are officially finished recruiting and have our main lineup, if we ever need more members, or subs, we will post again :)
if the other guy doesn't work, ill fill in?
ill wait for him to respond, but its possible :)

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 

stop avoiding the question!


____

2 hours later...
____

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 
kidding
if your interested i just realised we only have a substitute mid, so if your interested add me wingdemov
May be interested. What's the schedule?

well, ah we dont have one as yet, we are a bunch of mates who would like to attempt to progress as a team (casually), we just lacked a top laner, im pretty flexible with schedules, but we can coordinate with the rest of the team to work out a fair schedule, as we have every other lane already :)

> [{quoted}](name=WingDemoV,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=xkVuZrZl,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-11-09T02:50:11.995+0000)
>
> well, ah we dont have one as yet, we are a bunch of mates who would like to attempt to progress as a team (casually), we just lacked a top laner, im pretty flexible with schedules, but we can coordinate with the rest of the team to work out a fair schedule, as we have every other lane already :)

Well I have a full time job. So if playing during the day is necessary I won't be a good fit.
thats the plan for me to bro, night games works better for the rest of the guys anyway, let me know :)

> [{quoted}](name=WingDemoV,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=xkVuZrZl,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-09T03:59:37.221+0000)
>
> thats the plan for me to bro, night games works better for the rest of the guys anyway, let me know :)

Well i'm usually reliably on from 3pm AEST QLD time (not AEDT) until 7pm. from Monday - Thursday. Some exceptions with having to cook dinner earlier / later depending on my partners schedule. Fridays 3pm - 5:30ish usually. Weekend varies never the same except in the early morning 5am - 9am.

Hopefully that information is useful.

well, thats definitely more than enough time to work with, the team is usually available around the evening, but if you want we can invite you, and schedule a group discussion, when the guys are all online and organise the times that they can comply with yours, those times are fine for me.

also i notice your gold, just to inform you, we are all currently low/mid and high bronze ranks, i hope thats cool with you, we think we may be able to rank a bit higher as team, but still being an enjoyable casual team :)

> [{quoted}](name=WingDemoV,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=xkVuZrZl,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-09T04:20:59.419+0000)
>
> well, thats definitely more than enough time to work with, the team is usually available around the evening, but if you want we can invite you, and schedule a group discussion, when the guys are all online and organise the times that they can comply with yours, those times are fine for me.
> 
> also i notice your gold, just to inform you, we are all currently low/mid and high bronze ranks, i hope thats cool with you, we think we may be able to rank a bit higher as team, but still being an enjoyable casual team :)

Yeah rank doesn't bother me at all I just enjoy playing as a group of 5. 

Add me in game - ING: roguestoney. 

I will be on in approx 35 minutes. Just leaving work now!!! =) =)
